content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 32, "index": 10}, {"type": "armor_stand", "quantity": 7, "index": 12}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "knowledge_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "magenta_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "spider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 19}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 4, "index": 21}, {"type": "oak_fence", "quantity": 7, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "fire_coral_fan", "quantity": 61, "index": 27}, {"type": "emerald", "quantity": 17, "index": 28}, {"type": "music_disc_ward", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "cyan_wool", "quantity": 63, "index": 31}, {"type": "quartz_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 33}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 24, "index": 39}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 40}, {"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 4, "index": 43}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 13, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a gray_bed, I need to craft warped_planks first. To do so, I need to move 2 stripped_warped_stems into the crafting grid. The first stripped_warped_stem is at slot 24, so I move it into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1
